歰字的基本解释

歰
sè
古同“涩”。

歰
shà
古代出殡时的棺饰：“周人之葬墙置歰。”

歰字的汉语字典释义

[①]［sè］
［《廣韻》色立切，入緝，生。］
(1)不滑，滞涩。
(2)口吃。
(3)涩口，苦涩。
[②]［shà］
［《集韻》色甲切，入狎，生。］
通“翣1”。
棺羽饰。

歰字的康熙字典解释

【辰集下】【止字部】　歰； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页576第43
【唐韻】色立切【集韻】色入切，?音濇。【說文】不滑也。【玉篇】難轉也。　又【博雅】歰，吃也。【揚子·方言】?極，吃也。楚語也。或謂之軋，或謂之歰。【郭註】語歰難也。　又【六書故】水涸行艱謂之歰，味苦歰亦謂之歰。　又【集韻】色甲切，音箑。與翣同。棺羽飾也。【周禮·天官】縫人衣翣柳之材。【註】翣柳作接橮。鄭司農云：接讀爲歰，橮讀爲柳，皆棺飾。檀弓曰：周人牆置翣。《春秋傳》曰四歰不蹕。今《左傳》歰作翣。　【說文】从四止。【徐鉉曰】四皆止，故爲歰。當作歰。經典作歰。【集韻】或作澀、?、澁。詳水部澀字註。歰从二?。

Basic explanation of words
歰
sè
The ancients are "astringent".
歰
shà
Ancient coffin decorations during funerals: "The burial wall of Zhou people is set aside."
歰
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [sè]
["Guangyun" is a sharp cut, seized, and born. ]
(1) Not slippery, stagnant.
(2) Stuttering.
(3) Astringent mouth, bitterness.
[②]［shà］
["Jiyun" color armor cut, enter the 狎, give birth. ]
Linked with "翣1".
Coffin feather decoration.
歰
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Jixia] [Zhizi Department] 　歰; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 576 Page 43
[Tang Yun] Se Li Qi [Ji Yun] Se Li Qi cut,? Yin Yi. [Said Wen] It's not slippery. 【Jade articles】It is difficult to transfer.　[Bo Ya] again, eat too. [Yangtze Dialect]? Extremely, eat too. Chu language also. Or it is called rolling, or it is called 歰. [Guo's Note] The language is difficult.　[The Story of the Six Books] The water is hard to travel, and the taste is hard.　[Jiyun] Color Jiaqie, Yin Chu. The same as Zhuo. The coffin feather is also decorated. [Zhou Li·Tian Guan] Sewing human clothes and willow material. [Note] The willow is used as a pick-up. Zheng Sinongyun: Reading as "歰" and "Liu" as "Liu", both are decorated with coffins. Tan Gong said: Zhou's wall was set up. "Chun Qiu Biography" says that the four nights are not stunned. Today's "Zuo Zhuan" is made up.　【Said the text】From the four only. [Xu Xuan said] There are no four, so it is "Xu Xuan". Treat it as a shame. Classic work. [Ji Yun] Or make astringent,?, awkward. Note on the astringent words of the Ministry of Water. What's the difference?
